name: VazzLox Motion Sensor Light for Home (Pack of 2)

description.description: ENERGY-EFFICIENT: VazzLox rechargeable motion sensor light automatically turn on when motion is detected within a 5-10 ft. range, automatically powers off after 15-20 seconds of inactivity, this magnetic motion activated light will lighting your path as you cross and shutting off soon after.
